name: Pong Warriors
description:
Warning

Game has no sound fx and collisions can be weird.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls
Player 1 WASD
Player 2 Arrow keys
space to pause
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Pong Warriors is a small test game I made using love2d. I don't really plan on continue this project but making it was good way of learning the love2d framework.

I released the source files including a .love file. The folder contains an unused sound files. Also a heads up the code isn't very clean but i think its still readable :D
